messages.title: Help Fred
messages.content: Win here. Candidate endorsed by local newspaper. The best thing Edinburgh South needs is another government yes-man.

messages.title: Iraq War
messages.content: A delayed call for our troops. Voter's opinion on Liberal Democrats' stand on the Iraq war and Liberal Democrats' proposals on NHS.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Blames Gordon Brown for the recession, abolished 10p tax rate, stealth taxes hurting families.
Council tax reduction for pensioners, fought to protect local schools and post offices, securing investment in local services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Call to action for voters who have previously voted for Labour or Conservatives.

issues.economy: Tax Rises sorting out the banks.

housing.content: Proposals include the right for residents to have a say on major planning applications in their area.

leaflet.personalStatement: Fred Mackintosh's statement says he is not afraid to say what he thinks and is someone who stands up for what he believes.

politicalExperience.achievements: Reducing crime, improving schools and protecting the environment.

quotes.text: Fred argued for a fresh approach and an end to the Council Tax.

images.caption: Front page endorsement by local newspaper.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Mentions of tactical voting; Focus on criticizing Labour's record, particularly Gordon Brown.
